main_definition: Not connected to the internet or not accessible through online platforms.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Away from network connectivity, including the Internet.
meanings_and_examples.example: I can't access my email while I'm offline on this trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not available online or not present in digital form.
meanings_and_examples.example: The bookstore has a collection of classic novels that are only sold offline.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Separate from the electronic world, often used to describe activities without internet usage.
meanings_and_examples.example: During our family gathering, we enjoyed games and conversations in an offline environment, away from phones and screens.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to software or systems that operate without needing an Internet connection.
meanings_and_examples.example: Some word processors allow you to work entirely offline, saving changes locally until you're back online.
